name: Carlos â€¢ makers.so template
description:
This is actually a fully responsive site. Preview it here: https://carlos.makers.so


Carlos is a ready to use makers.so template. Makers is a Figma Plugin to go from Figma to site with one click. 


Simply duplicate this file, install makers and turn it into a site with only one click. Then, tweak the design, make it your own and publish to your own custom domain. 


This design was inspired by the amazing Carlos Montoya. Go give him a follow at Twitter: he is @losmontoya_
